articles.author: Chloe Cornish
articles.title: Bain Capital buys Gautam Adani's stake in shadow bank - Financial Times
articles.description: Indian billionaire offloads shares in lending business to focus on core enterprises
articles.content: US private equity group Bain Capital has agreed to buy Indian billionaire Gautam Adanis entire stake in his so-called shadow bank, as the infrastructure billionaire focuses on core businesses followi… [+2570 chars]
